alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Johnson; Keokuk; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Louisa, southeastern Keokuk, southwestern Cedar, southern Johnson, Washington and northwestern Muscatine Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hills to 6 miles east of Hayesville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Iowa City, University Heights and Hills around 735 PM CDT. Riverside around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lone Tree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Johnson; Keokuk; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington
